Data Sci Workflow

## Packages
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("plotly")
```

## Data load
```{r}
library(readr)
pca_202509 <- read_csv("https://opendata.nhsbsa.net/dataset/358e443c-b299-4370-aed4-eca63ce3ba68/resource/c8c5d961-d0f9-4e4f-9e4d-7eb0dcf25cb5/download/pca_202509.csv")

```

## Subsetting data
```{r}

pca_202509 <- pca_202509 %>%
 filter(!(REGION_NAME %in% c("EAST OF ENGLAND", "MIDLANDS"))) %>%
 filter(!(DISPENSER_ACCOUNT_TYPE %in% 
 "English Pharmacy")) %>%
 filter(!(BNF_CHAPTER %in% c("Appliances", "Immunological Products and Vaccines", 
"Preparations used in Diagnosis")))

```

## Data Viz
```{r}
dv1 <- ggplot(pca_202509) +
  aes(x = REGION_CODE, fill = DISPENSER_ACCOUNT_TYPE) +
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()
dv1
```

```{r}
ggplotly(dv1)
```
